morfologik.tools

Class FSABuildTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • morfologik.tools.FSABuildTool

  • public final class FSABuildTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert from plain text input to a serialized FSA in any of the available FSABuildTool.Formats.
